meanings.definition: Administers a vaccine to someone again.
meanings.sent1: The doctor revaccinates the patient to ensure full protection.
meanings.sent2: It is important to revaccinate children to boost their immunity.
meanings.sent3: The nurse revaccinates the teddy bear to keep it healthy and strong.
meanings.sent4: Just like watering a plant, revaccinating helps the body grow stronger defenses.
meanings.sent5: Remember to revaccinate regularly for continued health benefits.

meanings.definition: Gives a second dose of a vaccine to someone.
meanings.sent1: She revaccinates her cat to keep it safe from diseases.
meanings.sent2: The clinic will revaccinate all pets for their well-being.
meanings.sent3: The dog happily wags its tail after being revaccinated.
meanings.sent4: Revaccinating is like giving a shield to protect against illnesses.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to revaccinate your furry friends for their health.
